snippet: One police officer was killed and four others were wounded Thursday in a shootout that began as part of a drug investigation in Greenland, a coastal town.
abstract: One police officer is killed and four others are wounded in a shootout that occurred as part of a drug investigation in Greenland, NH.
lead_paragraph: One police officer was killed and four others were wounded Thursday in a shootout that began as part of a drug investigation in Greenland, a coastal town.

headline.main: New Hampshire: Officer Killed, 4 Hurt in Shootout
headline.print_headline: New Hampshire: Officer Killed, 4 Hurt In Shootout
